snippet: After an 11-day trial, a 23-year-old man charged in the killing of the Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor in 2007 was found guilty of second-degree murder and armed burglary.
abstract: Eric Rivera Jr, appearing in Miami courtroom, is found guilty of second-degree murder and armed robbery for the 2007 killing of Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor.
lead_paragraph: After an 11-day trial, a 23-year-old man charged in the killing of the Washington Redskins star Sean Taylor in 2007 was found guilty of second-degree murder and armed burglary.

headline.main: A Finding of Guilty in the Killing of Sean Taylor
headline.print_headline: Man, 23, Found Guilty in 2007 Slaying of Redskins Defensive Back Taylor
